content:
How to tell a drop-down is a single or multiple selection ?

Here is the description in the spec about : check-box
A control where an item (or multiple items) can be selected from a list that is only displayed when the user is editing the field.

http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/codesystem-questionnaire-item-control.html#questionnaire-item-control-drop-down
better to ask in the #questionnaire stream (sorry mistyped)
@Eric Haas Why subscription? Isn't this for #questionnaire ?
Short answer - by whether the element is marked as repeat=true or not. There are also standard extensions to give more guidance about what controls should be used.
